Row.Text: In this age of reason, the policies of our country are being rendered backwards and obsolete. We must hold a Great Sejm, to address the defects of our realm, thoroughly reform it, and thus rejuvenate it, so that Poland will be in the vanguard of enlightenment and liberty once again.
